page.title: 17TRADE
page.content: Trade in our area is limited to small shops privately owned. On our survey of buildings in the area there was a large numbered of shops which had ceased trading; many of these being converted into private dwellings. Most consumer goods are available at these local shops though prices are a great deal cheaper at the neighbouring towns. Trade for these local firms is boosted by the difficulty in travelling to neighbouring towns and returning with large amounts of shopping. There is no doubt that local traders would suffer if transport to these towns was more frequent.
